summary: This bill, S. 2171, aims to prohibit smoking on the premises of all facilities under the Veterans Health Administration (VHA). It amends Title 38 of the United States Code to define "facility" and "smoke," including electronic nicotine delivery systems. The bill also contains clerical and conforming amendments related to this prohibition, repealing an existing section of the Veterans Health Care Act of 1992 that related to the topic.  The bill was introduced by Mr. Durbin and others and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
